pkgmetadata.longdescription: Post Double Selection with Double Machine Learning // Implements post double selection using double machine learning, see Chernozhukov, Chetverikov, Demirer, Duflo, Hansen, Newey, Robins (2017) doi:10.1111/ectj.12097, for various models, using several back ends. Allows the user flexibility in specifying their own methods for estimation.
